body_html:
@ezyang thank you for all these details !

It’s true that yesterday I remarked the missing cuda tensor for the hidden and cell states but it worked on the stable version.

I’ll try later today to see if this works on my code.

I’m sorry to not have put the whole code. Tell me if you need the whole model :)

body:
@ezyang thank you for all these details !

It’s true that yesterday I remarked the missing cuda tensor for the hidden and cell states but it worked on the stable version.

I’ll try later today to see if this works on my code.

I’m sorry to not have put the whole code. Tell me if you need the whole model :)
